actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency..

official_title: A bill to amend the National Flood Insurance Act of 1968 to extend coverage under the flood insurance program to include losses from surface or floating ice.

summary.text: Extends coverage under the flood insurance program of the National Flood Insurance Act of 1968 to include losses from surface or floating ice. (Adds 42 U.S.C. 4001(g), 4121(c))

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Flood Insurance Act of 1968 to extend coverage under the flood insurance program to include losses from surface or floating ice.
